DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study protocol single centre , randomize , double blind , placebo control , single repeat dose study investigate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics intravenous dose Colistin Methanesulfonate Sodium ( CMS-Na ) healthy Japanese male subject . Eighteen subject receive CMS-Na 2.5mg/kg ( colistin activity 75,000 IU/kg ) placebo single dose twice daily 2.5 day intravenous infusion . Blood urine sample pharmacokinetics analysis take regular interval dose . Safety assess measurement vital sign , Echocardiogram ( ECGs ) , safety laboratory data , renal function review adverse event .
